Jeremy ran out of school as soon as the bell rang. He was so excited for what was happening that night. He was going to a Miley Cyrus concert! It sounded a little gay that a teenage boy was going to a Miley Cyrus concert, but Jeremy didn't care. He thought Miley was really cute, and he got the tickets for free along with some backstage passes. He ran home full of excitement.
-----------------------------------------------------------
The concert ended and Jeremy was ready to go backstage. He went up a staircase and opened a large metal door to reveal a long hallway full of doors. He walked down the hallway until he found a door that said "Miley" which he assumed was her dressing room. He knocked on the door a couple of times and waited for her to answer. He couldn't believe he was about to meet Miley Cyrus! The door slowly opened and he was soon standing right in front of Miley Cyrus.
"Hey you must be Jeremy," she said with a smile.
Jeremy couldn't believe she knew his name. His stomach started to feel sick. He was so nervous.
"Yeah Miley yes I'm Jeremy," he stammered.
"Nice to meet you. Do you want to come in?" she said with a slight giggle.
"Sure," said Jeremy with a nervous laugh.
They walked into the dressing room and Miley sat down on a green couch. Jeremy sat on a small metal chair across from her. Miley sprawled herself out on the sofa and yawned. She kicked off her sneakers to reveal her white knee socks. Jeremy looked down at her feet with disgust. He had a terrible fear of feet. He hated everything about them. He didn't like the way they looked, the way they smelled, and especially the way they tasted. He had encountered them before in a few situations that sparked this fear in him.
"Ouch my feet hurt so bad! Do you mind if I take off my socks?" asked Miley.
What was Jeremy going to do? He was scared of feet, but this was Miley Cyrus! Also this was her dressing room, so he didn't want to be rude.

She remembered something she had bought the other day that would make this experience much better! She was going to use her new shrink ray on Jeremy and make him as small as a bug!
"Stay right there Jeremy, I'm going to go get something very special for you," she laughed as she walked away.
She was only on the other side of the room, but Jeremy thought he might be able to escape while she was occupied with something else. What if he didn't get away in time though? She might get mad, but he had to do something and he had to do it quick!

Staring down at you were two beautiful young giants, Miley Cyrus and Taylor Swift. They were giggling and glancing at eachother. Miley suddenly scoops you up and puts you on the floor next to the couch. Taylor then sits on the couch and puts her size 10 feet on each side of you, blocking your path. Her feet were 10 times smellier than Miley's and were literally dripping sweat everywhere.

"I'd like you to meet Taylor's feet. She's been performing in her tight, hot cowboy boots all night, too, and she wants someone to lick the sweat off her feet!" Miley says to you. "And it's not going to be me.

Taylor then covers your entire body with her soles.

1221.content: What does Miley do to Jeremy?
1221.title: fsdafasdfa

info.brief_description: Miley Cyrus makes you tiny and you must worship her feet!
info.description:
This story is all about Miley Cyrus shrinking you down to 2 inches tall and torturing you with her feet. Try to keep most of the stuff about feet. Boob and butt stuff is alright, but keep it at a minimum. This is a foot fetish story. The only male character is Jeremy. Miley shrinks Jeremy and doesn't shrink anyone else, and Jeremy is the only male character in the story. Miley can invite friends over to help her torture Jeremy, but the only ones she can invite are Emily Osment (co-star from Hannah Montana) and Taylor Swift (fellow singer) and nobody else.
If you don't know these 3 girls then check out these pitures. (which include their feet)
Miley Cyrus
http://static.desktopnexus.com/wallpapers/9778-bigthumbnail.jpg
Emily Osment
http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3085/2555816683_7c8df95413.jpg
Taylor Swift
http://userserve-ak.last.fm/serve/_/9773627/Taylor+Swift+Taylor++Flowers.jpg

So... as for Jeremy, he's just an average guy about 15 years old. He has trouble in school and doesn't have a foot fetish. He is disgusted by feet and meets Miley backstage at a concert. Most of the torture will happen back at Miley's house though. Keep her barefoot most of the time or with socks, but she can put him inside of her shoes. Basically just have fun with it. If you write something good I'll give ya some gift points. Remember, keep it mostly about feet!
